casebody.data:
BRITISH AMERICAN TOBACCO COMPANY, LTD., v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 43217] [89 C. Cls. 438;

— U. S. —]

Jurisdiction; suits instituted upon same set of facts. Petition dismissed November 6, 1939; plaintiff’s motion for new trial overruled January 8, 1940,

Petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court, May 6, 1940.
